name: GRBG
description:
You're in a forest with pissed animals at night and must avoid getting eaten or freezing to death.

How To Play

You need to fuel your fire with branches to stay warm to stay alive. Keep walking in the forest until you step on a branch and grab it. If you see eyes poking out of a tree, shoot them. If you see spiders above you, shoot them. If you see rustling in the grass, shoot them. Survive till 6am.

Controls

A / Left Key / D / Right Key - Walking left or right

Q - Reloading

E - Grab or fuel

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

GRBG

You'll never guess what it stands for.... Unless you do guess.
